value.title: Survey finds talent gap is slowing enterprise AI adoption
value.excerpt: According to an O'Reilly survey, enterprises are struggling to overcome a talent gap in data science, affecting their ability to adopt AI.

value.title: US banks deploy AI to monitor customers, workers amid tech backlash
value.excerpt: Several US banks have started deploying camera software that can analyze customer preferences, monitor workers and spot people sleeping near ATMs, even as they remain wary about possible backlash

value.title: Baidu Stock: 3 Reasons To Stay Away
value.excerpt: As for the autonomous technology, Baidu has certainly made progress. The Apollo Self Driving (ASD) system was able to snag partnerships with ten local and multinational automakers. The ...

value.title: Two dead in self-driving Tesla crash after hitting tree, bursting into flames
value.excerpt: Two men were killed in Spring, Texas after officials said a Tesla was driving itself when it ran off road, hit a tree and burst into flames.

value.title: 12 Expert Tips To Help Small Businesses Affordably Leverage AI/ML
value.excerpt: However, with careful planning and targeted implementation, even small businesses can tap into the power of AI and ML. To help, 12 experts from Forbes Technology Council share tips to help small businesses incorporate AI and ML without breaking the bank.

value.title: Everything Elon Musk Has Said About Tesla's Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has had a lot to say about Tesla's Autopilot feature, which may have been connected to two deaths in an accident on Saturday in Texas.

value.title: US banks are using AI to watch customers and employees
value.excerpt: Chase developed its AI camera system using components from Google, IBM Watson and Amazon Web Services. Its cameras aim to monitor banking transaction times, how many customers leave because of long lines, and what activities occupy workers. Some banks use ...

value.title: Bird’s-Eye View To Provide Self-Driving Cars With Some Needed Computational Omnipresence
value.excerpt: Latest tech allows for a bird's-eye view of a driving scene, referred to as computational omnipresence, which could be a huge boon toward the advent of self-driving cars.

value.title: Ambow Education Soars on AI Deal with Amazon
value.excerpt: Ambow Education expanded its Amazon partnership to help improve the company's engineering courses and address growing job-placement needs.

value.title: Army researchers create pioneering approach to real-time conversational AI
value.excerpt: Spoken dialogue is the most natural way for people to interact with complex autonomous agents such as robots. Future Army operational environments will require technology that allows artificial intelligent agents to understand and carry out commands and interact with them as teammates.

value.title: ZF augments vehicle intelligence with next-gen AI supercomputer
value.excerpt: German car parts maker Zahnradfabrik Friedrichshafen (ZF) has unveiled the next generation of its AI -based supercomputer ZF ProAI. The new ZF ProAI, which ZF claims is “the most flexible, scalable, and powerful automotive -grade supercomputer in the world,

value.title: Saudi Aramco accelerates employee expertise with conversational AI and enterprise search
value.excerpt: IBM Watson Discovery reduces research time for scientists by up to 75% Agents using IBM Watson Assistant chatbot handle calls 10% faster In this time of unprecedented change, Saudi Aramco has fully committed to automating the most arduous of their manual processes. By adopting AI-infused workflows and

value.title: Protecting Rainforests With Big Data And AI: Four Key Lessons For The Enterprise
value.excerpt: Our algorithms give rangers five days’ advance notice of a likely logging event, with 96% accuracy. With the help of deep learning and analytics, Rainforest Connection went from merely detecting illegal logging to predicting and preventing deforestation.

value.title: Volvo will provide cars for Didi’s autonomous vehicle division
value.excerpt: Volvo will provide vehicles for Didi Chuxing’s self-driving taxi fleet, according to a new deal between the two companies. The Swedish automaker, which is owned by China’s largest private automaker Geely,

value.title: Ambow Education Expands Partnership with Amazon in Artificial Intelligence Training for Teachers
value.excerpt: Ambow Education Holding Ltd. ("Ambow" or "the Company") (NYSE American: AMBO), China's leading provider of educational and career enhancement

value.title: HDS, from the Borders and Webvan founder, raises $3M as it gears up to launch its robot-run grocery and general merchandise play
value.excerpt: The online grocery market is poised to get a little more crowded in the next several months, with the launch of a startup led by a veteran founder who has taken big hits from Amazon in the past, but now hopes to come back swinging with the help of an army of robots.

value.title: UiPath boosts IPO price range, aims for $28 billion valuation
value.excerpt: Automation tech startup UiPath on Monday boosted the price range for its initial public offering (IPO) in New York, and is now targeting a valuation of nearly $28 billion, setting the stage for yet another high-profile tech listing this year.

value.title: Want to Get Along With Robots? Pretend They’re Animals
value.excerpt: Robotics ethicist Kate Darling surveys our history with animals—in work, war, and companionship—to show how we might develop similar relationships with robots.

value.title: Shanghai Auto Show: Chinese internet search giant Baidu to supply its Apollo self-driving system to 1 million cars in 3-5 years
value.excerpt: Baidu expects to supply its Apollo autonomous driving system to 1 million cars in the next three to five years.

value.title: Three practical ways AI will help finance shape up for the future
value.excerpt: AI in finance is capable of much more than shortening processes by a few days here and there. Erik Zahnlecker of Sage AI Labs shares three concepts that make the most of the growing financial data available to customers.

value.title: ECOVACS ROBOTICS Introduces the DEEBOT N8 Family In Thailand
value.excerpt: ECOVACS ROBOTICS, the world's leading home service robotics maker, today announces the launch of the DEEBOT N8 Family in Thailand, bringing a hands-free and effectively superior cleaning experience for customers.

value.title: Google translation AI botches legal terms ‘enjoin,’ ‘garnish’ -research
value.excerpt: Translation tools from Alphabet Inc’s Google and other companies could be contributing to significant misunderstanding of legal terms with conflicting meanings such as “enjoin,” according to research due to be presented at an academic workshop on Monday.

value.title: IIT Roorkee announces online certification programs in Data Science and Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Indian Institute of Technology, IIT Roorkee, launches online certification programs in Data Science and Machine Learning. Prof. Ajit K. Chaturvedi, Director, IIT Roorkee announces this through a press release.

value.title: Veoneer radar and stereovision aid Mercedes EQS hands-off self-driving tech
value.excerpt: Automotive technology company Veoneer has supplied critical building blocks in the recently revealed Mercedes EQS, the all-electric sedan equipped to offer hands-off self-driving tech. The Mercedes EQS Drive Pilot system is an example of collaborative driving;

value.title: She’s Taking Jeff Bezos to Task
value.excerpt: Joy Buolamwini is on a crusade against bias in facial recognition technology, and the powerful companies that profit from it.
